author: sascharodekamp
msg: js issue causes error when invalid dates are entered (https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/OFBIZ-4982). A patch from Christoph Neuroth: Reproduce: Enter "123" in a DateField. This will trigger a JS exception and the invalid value will be sent to the server on form submission, probably causing server-side exceptions in badly written backend code, resulting in really bad error messages for the user.
